procedure.title: Provision of Programme Director Services for Finance Transformation Programme
procedure.description: UCD wish to procure a number of key resources including the services of a Programme Director, Solution Architect, Enterprise Architect, Test Manager and Functional Leads for Otc and StP for the transformation programme FinPOST - Finance Programme for Operations and Services Transformation. The programme is currently in train, having selected the UCD’s Finance ERP and SI partner earlier this year. At present the programme is progressing through its validation phase which is expected to conclude in June 2024. The programme is then expected to progress to construction, testing (including user acceptance testing) and training over the coming month with go live expected in Q2 2025.
